last_episode_to_air.name: Closing Up Shop
last_episode_to_air.overview: A lack of consumer traffic prompts Noah to accept a deal to sell the Noddy shop and clear out all the toys.

name: Noddy
overview: After years of sailing the sea, Noah Tomten, a retired sea captain, owns an antique toy store called Notions Oddities Doodads and Delights of Yesterday, a variety of toys, from a weasel living inside of a jack in the box to a dog pretending to be a superhero, along with his pet lobster. Two of his grandkids, Kate and Truman, as well as Kate's friend DJ, come to visit him from time to time.

episodes.name: The Magic Key
episodes.overview: Kate, D.J. and Truman enter the Noddy Shop for the first time.  They find a magic key that unlocks two boxes.  That act releases the Goblins from one box.  The other box contains all the toys that make up the Noddy stories.

episodes.name: Mixed Up Magic
episodes.overview: Noah plans to sell some of the Noddy Shop's coveted toys.  One of them, Warlow the Weasel, is planning to sabotage the sale.  So are the golins.

episodes.name: Lost and Found
episodes.overview: Truman doesn't want to play the games Kate and D.J. are playing.  They suggest ""hide and seek"" as a way to get Truman out of their hair, but he gets lost.

episodes.name: Twinkle, Twinkle Little Goblins
episodes.overview: Aunt Agatha is not prepared for her campout with the kids.  Although Noah offers to help, he gets no takers.

episodes.name: The Tooth Fairy
episodes.overview: A strange woman eyes a fairy dress at the Noddy shop just as Truman's first baby tooth is ready to fall out.

episodes.name: Stop, Listen and Learn
episodes.overview: Noah and D.J. find there is value in asking questions about difficult situations.

episodes.name: Making Up Is Easy To Do
episodes.overview: Material possessions cause unrest among the kids and toys.

episodes.name: If At First You Don't Succeed
episodes.overview: It's the annual Littleton Falls Bike-a-Thon.  Aunt Agatha tries to entertain the bikers with a few opera numbers.  That makes it that much harder for D.J. to earn money.

episodes.name: The Birthday Party
episodes.overview: The kids and Aunt Agatha have a surprise birthday party planned for Noah. As they work behind Noah's back, Truman and Aunt Agatha learn that the thought behind the birthday wish matters most.

episodes.name: Telling Tails
episodes.overview: A lot of things go missing in the Noddy shop. In their haste, people blame others for taking things.

episodes.name: It's About Time
episodes.overview: Truman says he can tell Noah when it's 4:00, but can he really?

episodes.name: A Promise is a Promise
episodes.overview: The kids vow to put on a play, but there are other promises to keep.

episodes.name: To the Rescue
episodes.overview: All the special toys in the Noddy Shop form their own fire department.  Mirroring that is the Noddy story about a fire in Toyland.

episodes.name: Chills and Spills
episodes.overview: Truman throws mud around and, in the process, getting Noah's sheets dirty.  He tries to hide the sheets, but that invariably gets Truman in deeper trouble.  Aunt Agatha finds her plums missing, which starts a rash of missing items.

episodes.name: The Big Race
episodes.overview: Aunt Agatha's grandson brings his bully friends to the Noddy shop. Both Rox and Grit want to show up Kate, D.J. and Truman at Sports Day.

episodes.name: A Dog's Best Friend
episodes.overview: Kate and Truman discover a dog to play with. This leaves the toy Planet Pup out in the cold.

episodes.name: Hooray for the Kids
episodes.overview: Kate, D.J. and Truman, along with Aunt Agatha, decide to stage a surprise party for Noah.

episodes.name: The Mystery Box
episodes.overview: Agatha has a package for D.J., and it brings intrigue.

episodes.name: We All Say Boo!
episodes.overview: A great deal more magic occurs at the Noddy shop in time for Halloween.

episodes.name: Trying Something New
episodes.overview: Noah asks Kate to run the shop.  Truman takes his own new paces as he learns to ride a bike.

episodes.name: The Fish Story
episodes.overview: Kate's mother had given her a ruby, but Kate loses it and doesn't know what to say.  Another fish story develops when a new fish lives in Johnny Crawfish's tank.

episodes.name: The Big Fight
episodes.overview: With an illusory beginning, Agatha and Noah can't see eye to eye.  Does this mean they won't speak to each other?

episodes.name: Following Directions
episodes.overview: Aunt Agatha wants to make changes in the Noddy shop.  How successful those changes are, will be a matter of doing what she says.

episodes.name: Mixed Up Masks
episodes.overview: For D.J., it shouldn't be hard to make new friends.  His problem is that a friend already has a friend.  Confusing?  Nothing is more confusing than the masks.

episodes.name: Truman Come Home
episodes.overview: Truman needs someone to play with on a boring day. With no one to help his cause, idle Truman finds himself doing something wrong.

episodes.name: Something's Lost, Something's Found
episodes.overview: One of the things near and dear to Noah, besides his toys, is the lucky compass he had used as a sailor. Kate and D.J. borrow the compass and subsequently lose it.

episodes.name: The Magic Show
episodes.overview: D.J. wants to perform magic at the school's talent contest.

episodes.name: The Big Mess
episodes.overview: Aunt Agatha's remote-operated vacuum cleaner goes berserk when the Goblins steal the remote control.  Adding injury to injury, Warlow lets a parrot loose.  In the Toyland animation, Noddy has his hands full with a few hens.

episodes.name: Recipe For Learning
episodes.overview: All the children decide to hold a Mexican restaurant behind the Noddy Shop, only they don't know how to make anything.

episodes.name: Recycle and Reuse It
episodes.overview: It's not so much an overflow of trash at the Noddy shop. Rather, the kids find a lot of things with which they use for a puppet show.

episodes.name: Telling The Whole Truth
episodes.overview: Noah leaves the children in charge of the Noddy shop.  In trying to satisfy a snobbish customer, they break her gift.

episodes.name: Secret Valentines
episodes.overview: A slight miscommunication takes place on Valentine's Day: Kate receives a valentine, but D.J. does not.

episodes.name: Sing Yourself To Sleep
episodes.overview: Truman can't get to sleep one night at the Noddy shop. He believes in all the toys, all of which are ready to perform their usual songs.

episodes.name: Treasure Hunt
episodes.overview: A treasure map falls into Truman's hands. This sends all the kids in search of what they think is a great surprise.

episodes.name: Jack Frost Is Coming To Town
episodes.overview: The Noddy shop becomes cold inside when Jack Frost escapes from a snow globe and freezes several toys.  On this bitter cold day, Aunt Agatha has a scarf ready for Truman, but he doesn't want to wear it.

episodes.name: The Trouble With Truman
episodes.overview: The real trouble is that young Truman feels left out of his family.  It's up to Kate to create the sense in Truman that he belongs.

episodes.name: Let's Go Fly A Kite
episodes.overview: The wildest adventure of the them all begins when the adult Goblins use magic to fly a kite, and get whisked away. In his attempts to get them down, Boobull casts a lot of ill-advised spells that turn the Noddy shop inside-out.

episodes.name: Think Big
episodes.overview: Kate wants to go on a fantastic adventure. Who knows what will grant her wish?

episodes.name: Noah's Leaving
episodes.overview: Noah considers returning to his old role as a sea captain.

episodes.name: Anything Can Happen at Christmas
episodes.overview: Sharing is always a part of the holiday season, a fact the kids learn is not lost on Mrs. Santa Claus.

episodes.name: Dance To Your Own Music
episodes.overview: Noah has been taking dance lessons for an upcoming dance contest. Aunt Agatha, organizing the dance, has not practiced. And then there's Noddy, who meeds lessons if he is to join Tessie Bear in the Toytown [sic] Dance Competition.

episodes.name: Ask Permission
episodes.overview: Truman's new friend Sam takes a small mermaid belonging to Noah.

episodes.name: Take A Stand
episodes.overview: Itchy, Aunt Agatha's nephew, wants to see the antique horns that have just arrived at the Noddy shop. Both need money if they want to use the horns on their bikes. Maybe they can help Kate and D.J., wwho set up a cookie stand outside the shop.

episodes.name: The Sandman Cometh
episodes.overview: Kate and D.J., in preparation for a sleepover, take a package to the Noddy shop.  That package belongs to the Sandman, and it spells trouble for Truman and, by extension, everyone else.

episodes.name: Noah's Treasure
episodes.overview: A call from an old seamate alerts Noah to two gold coins. Noah is told the gold coins are part of an old pirate treasure. Before Noah knows it, a bunch of other interests want in on the gold. Lost in the confusion is the fact that April-May had just rescued a stray cat.

episodes.name: Be True to Who You Are
episodes.overview: When Kate is welcomed into a cool girls' club, she tries to act mature by shunning her old ways.

episodes.name: All Play and No Work
episodes.overview: Truman has held off finishing his homework.  Worse, he hasn't studied for an impending test.

episodes.name: Lights, Camera, Chaos
episodes.overview: Kate, D.J. and Truman want to make a mystery movie. In preparation for The Case of the Missing Necklace, Kate doesn't know that her necklace, intended as a prop for the movie, has really been stolen by the Goblins.

episodes.name: How Rude
episodes.overview: Noah says that rudeness is like a spell of bad magic. Given the chance, Warlow reads a spell from the Goblins' book. It sends all the toys in the Noddy shop on a tear of bad moods.

episodes.name: Part Of The Family
episodes.overview: Mother's Day is approaching, and the kids prepare Mother's  Day cards. They encounter Julie, a foster child who is bitter with all the talk of mothers. But her presence brings to life Angelina, a doll that had been lost in the depths of the stockroom.

episodes.name: Playing Attention To Kate
episodes.overview: Kate becomes upset to no end because everyone else is devoted to something or soneone else.

episodes.name: Skunked
episodes.overview: The Goblin mother and father had fallen prey to the smell of a visiting skunk. Boobull casts a spell to clean up the Goblins, but the smell mysteriously moved on to Truman.

episodes.name: Going Bananas
episodes.overview: Toy Sherman believes cleanliness is next to happiness.  He cannot fathom the stink that will be raised over the big mess at the Noddy Shop.

episodes.name: Slugger
episodes.overview: Two Little League baseball players refuse to let Truman and Sam play with them because they're too small. With Kate and D.J. backing them up, they challenge the Little Leaguers to a game. But the circumstances change when a ball possessed with goblin magic comes into play.

episodes.name: Find Your Own Song
episodes.overview: Everyone seems obsessed with doing something for the Robbie MacRhino talent contest.  When Lurk and Snipe interfere with Kate's and D.J.'s entries, Boobull feels there is only one way to mend things: grow to human form.

episodes.name: The Big Showdown
episodes.overview: Aunt Agatha is determined to rid the Noddy Shop of the Goblins, and so enlists an exterminator for help.

episodes.name: Growing Lies
episodes.overview: Truman had been guilty before of not telling the truth.  Now he needs a device for telling that truth.

episodes.name: The Human Touch
episodes.overview: There is a place for technology, and a place for what is considered ""old"" or ""antique,"" as Noah knows.  But Aunt Agatha buys a computer for Noah's office.  That drives Kate and D.J. to the computer.  When they hook up a robot called Disrupto, it sets out to control the toys.

episodes.name: Be Patient
episodes.overview: Aunt Agatha is ready to stage a hat show at the Noddy shop, but she hasn't tested any of her dance-music-playing hats yet.  Kate and D.J. have no luck trying to sell apples that they plcuked while still green.

episodes.name: Kate Loves a Parade
episodes.overview: Kate has been chosen to lead the Littleton Falls parade.  In the moments before the parade, though, Kate is afraid of making mistakes.

episodes.name: Closing Up Shop
episodes.overview: A lack of consumer traffic prompts Noah to accept a deal to sell the Noddy shop and clear out all the toys.

episodes.name: The Case of The Missing Ball
